attributes.name: useLimitingFrequencies
attributes.description: Use added mass zero and/or added mass infinite if these exist

attributes.name: cutFactor
attributes.description: factor for cut of fft. Default 200

attributes.name: powerOfTwo
attributes.description: Length of array used for fft/ifft. Default 2**13.

attributes.name: massCutFactor
attributes.description: Factor used together with structural mass to cut a degree of freedom.  Small factor means larger chance of cutting
